Package org.example.persistence.repository

Interface ComplaintRepository

All Known Implementing Classes:
ComplaintRepositoryImpl
public interface ComplaintRepository

Interface ComplaintRepository

This interface is used to declare the methods that are used for Complaint.

  • Method Details

    • get

      Complaint get(int id) throws NotFoundException
      Get a complaint by id. All the FetchType "LAZY" fields are set to null.
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the complaint
      Returns:
      The Complaint
      Throws:
      NotFoundException - If no complaint found with the given id

    • getAll

      List<Complaint> getAll()
      Get all complaints. All the FetchType "LAZY" fields are set to null.
      Returns:
      The List of Complaint

    • getAssignedEngineers

      List<Engineer> getAssignedEngineers(int complaintId) throws NotFoundException
      Returns the assigned engineers of a complaint
      Parameters:
      complaintId - The id of the complaint
      Returns:
      The List of Engineer assigned to the complaint
      Throws:
      NotFoundException - If no complaint found with the given id

    • createComplain

      void createComplain(String description, String createdByUserEmail, String categoryName, String statusName) throws NotFoundException
      Create a new complaint.
      Parameters:
      description - The description of the complaint. Throws IllegalArgumentException if it's null
      createdByUserEmail - The user email who created the complaint. If it's null, an IllegalArgumentException will be thrown
      categoryName - The name of the category. Throws IllegalArgumentException if it's null
      statusName - The name of the status. Throws IllegalArgumentException if it's null
      Throws:
      NotFoundException - If the provided user or the category or the status was not found

    • setDescription

      void setDescription(int id, String description) throws NotFoundException
      Set the description of a complaint
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the complaint
      description - The new description of the complaint, Throws IllegalArgumentException if it's null
      Throws:
      NotFoundException - If no complaint found with the given id

    • setCategory

      void setCategory(int id, String categoryName) throws NotFoundException
      Set the category of a complaint
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the complaint
      categoryName - The new category name of the complaint. Throws IllegalArgumentException if it's null
      Throws:
      NotFoundException - If no complaint or category found with the given id or name respectively

    • setStatus

      void setStatus(int id, String statusName) throws NotFoundException
      Set the status of a complaint
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the complaint
      statusName - The new status name of the complaint. Throws IllegalArgumentException if it's null
      Throws:
      NotFoundException - If no complaint or status found with the given id or name respectively

    • assignExistingEngineer

      void assignExistingEngineer(String email, int complainId) throws NotFoundException, AlreadyExistException
      Assign an employee to a complaint. Same as EngineerRepositoryImpl.assignExistingComplain(String, int) as Engineer and Complaint are in a bidirectional relation.
      Parameters:
      email - The email of the employee. Throws IllegalArgumentException if it's null
      complainId - The id of the complaint
      Throws:
      NotFoundException - If the employee or the complaint does not exist
      AlreadyExistException - If the employee already has the complaint assigned to them

    • removeAssignedEngineer

      void removeAssignedEngineer(String email, int complainId) throws NotFoundException
      Remove an employee from a complaint. Same as EngineerRepositoryImpl.removeAssignedComplain(String, int) as Engineer and Complaint are in a bidirectional relation.
      Parameters:
      email - The email of the employee. Throws IllegalArgumentException if it's null
      complainId - The id of the complaint.
      Throws:
      NotFoundException - If the employee or the complaint does not exist, or the employee does not have the complaint previously assigned to them

    • addUpdate

      void addUpdate(int complaintId, String message) throws NotFoundException
      Add a new Update to a complaint.
      Parameters:
      complaintId - The id of the complaint
      message - The new message of the update. If it's null, an IllegalArgumentException will be thrown
      Throws:
      NotFoundException - If no complaint found with the given id
